description: Ray Harmer is appointed to the role following the dismissal of rebel voter Chris Thomas last week.
title: Isle of Man Tynwald mini-reshuffle following minister's sacking
title_page: Isle of Man Tynwald mini-reshuffle following minister's sacking - BBC News
maintext: "Solid foundations for the future have been laid by the work that has been done since 2016 but we still have a great deal to deliver over the remaining time," he added.
